form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Scott of Florida (for himself and Mrs. Moody) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a reduced excise tax rate for portable, electronically-aerated bait containers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fishing Equipment Tax Relief Act of 2025.

section.header: Three percent rate for portable, electronically-aerated bait containers

subsection.text: Section 4161(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by redesignating paragraph (4) as paragraph (5) and by inserting after paragraph (3) the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: 3 percent rate for portable, electronically-aerated bait containers
paragraph.text: In the case of portable, electronically-aerated bait containers, paragraph (1) shall be applied by substituting 3 percent for 10 percent.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to articles sold by the manufacturer, producer, or importer after December 31, 2025.
